name: dfs-lineup-manager
description: A full-stack web application for managing Daily Fantasy Sports lineups

scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && python -m pytest test_weeks_api.py -v || python test_weeks_api.py
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: chmod +x start_dev.sh && npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
